# shinyADI

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of shinyADI is to provide an intuitive, interactive interface to the `get_adi()` function in the [sociome](https://github.com/ClevelandClinicQHS/sociome) R package.

Use the shiny app at <https://nikkrieger.shinyapps.io/shinyadi/>.

Or, run it using:

```{r eval=FALSE}
shiny::runGitHub("shinyADI", "NikKrieger")
```
